casebody.data:
RITTER
v.
RITTER. No. 205P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. John W. Bryant, Eva C. Currin, Raleigh, for Kerfoot Ritter.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of April 2006 by Plaintiff for "Petition for waiver of docketing Fees and costs for this petition due to indigency":

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."
